caption: Great food, family owned. A truly wholesome place. Be patient with service.

(Translated by Google) It is really good and all but there are times I go and no one is there so I gotta call but then she has to come and takes a while. When it is open, it is amazing and great prices tho.  It's great, but sometimes I go and there is no one. You have to call to come and cook and that takes a long time. When it is open, it is good and cheap.  (Original) It is really good and all but there are times I go and no one is there so I gotta call but then she has to come and takes a while. When it is open, it is amazing and great prices tho.  Está buenísimo, pero a vcs voy y no hay nadie. Toca llamar para que venga y cocine y eso se demora. Cuando está abierto, es bueno y barato.
This place melts my heart. The pupusas are delicious, and they are the kindest people who really care about the community. We need to keep this place in business!!!!

Randomly stumbled onto this place as they were closing and she ushered us in kindly after we stared at the menu for too long. We chatted with her as she made the pupusa‘s, left so she could close then found a park bench to eat them. Honestly some of the best Pupusas I have ever had. Of course, I’ve never been to El Salvador, but I did live in Washington DC for two years and had my fair share of excellante. Her salsa roja is 🔥as were the pupusas!! She opened up her business in 2019 just a few months before covid-19 and is struggling and I truly hope she succeeds because we need her! A gem.

(Translated by Google) Joy every time I come! It is a pleasure to come see Amanda, she is so sweet and her food is so delicious! It reminds me of my childhood and the pupusas I ate in Nicaragua. Everything is at a good price and done very quickly! I come every time I want healthy food but I don't have the energy to cook. It is a blessing every time I come. And fresh juice too! Make orange juice by hand! All done with so much love.  I feel joy every time I come here. The food is delicious and Amanda, the owner, is so sweet. It reminds me of the pupusas I would eat in Nicaragua. Very authentic. Everything is at good price and made very quickly. Would recommend to anyone and everyone. She makes fresh juice too! Fresh squeezed orange juice 🥰 All made with love❤️  (Original) Alegría cada vez que vengo! Es un placer venir a ver a Amanda, es tan dulce y su comida tan rica! Me recuerda de mi niñez y las pupusas que comía en Nicaragua. Todo está a buen precio y hecho muy rápido! Vengo cada vez que quiero comida saludable pero no tengo la energía para cocinar. Es una bendición cada vez que vengo. Y jugo fresco también! Hace jugo de naranja a mano! Todo hecho con tanto amor.  I feel joy every time I come here. The food is delicious and Amanda, the owner, is so sweet. It reminds me of the pupusas I would eat in Nicaragua. Very authentic. Everything is at good price and made very quickly. Would recommend to anyone and everyone. She makes fresh juice too! Fresh squeezed orange juice 🥰 All made with love❤️

Stopped by the other day after having it on my “want to go” list for about a year and very glad I went! Had a lovely chat with Amanda while she made my pupusas (fresh, of course) and tamales, which were fantastic (she even slipped in some jalapeños on my cheese pupusa)! Love this place

I’m from Maryland, just outside of DC and it’s an area known for it’s good pupuserias. So when I moved up to New York, I didn’t have a lot of hope for having good pupusas here until I found Alegria’s! I had pupusas revueltas, de queso, and one de frijol and they were all amazing and the prices were great!! Please go check this place out if you are in the area or if you just want really good pupusas :D muchas gracias por todo Alegria’s!!
One of the best pupusas I’ve ever had. Amazingly priced and personally made on the spot by Amanda herself. 10/10 recommend.
A treasure of the neighborhood. Amanda makes the best pupusas in Brooklyn and tells the most charming stories.
The pupusas were delicious and authentic, the same lady who has been on the block for years now has this larger space to offer a sit down experience, give it a try!
The pupusas are made with love fresh to order from the sweetest and kindest person you may ever meet -- they're delicious. Go here.
A friendly grandmother makes fresh papusas in the back, what else do you want?
Best and always fresh pupusas! Family ran business, well know in the community. They also do customer orders for events. Their food is made the day of the event as well.
The pupusas are delicious, super cheap, and come with slaw and hot sauce!
The new home of Amanda’s kitchen looks great! Amanda also has an expanded menu including loroco pupusas.
